ARABIC: إِنَّ وَلِۦِّىَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِى نَزَّلَ ٱلْكِتَٰبَ وَهُوَ يَتَوَلَّى ٱلصَّٰلِحِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: My Protector is Allah who sent down the Book. He takes care of the righteous.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: My saviour is God who has revealed this Book; and He protects those who are upright;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: My guardian is Allah Who has revealed the Book, and it is He Who protects the righteous.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: The (true) Guardian is certainly God who has revealed the Book and is the Guardian of the righteous ones.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “Indeed my Protector is Allah Who has sent down the Book; and He befriends the righteous.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Verily, my protector is Allah Who has revealed the Book (the Qur'an), and He protects the righteous.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Surely my guardian is Allah, Who revealed the Book, and He befriends the good.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: My Protector is God who sent down the Book, and He takes into His protection the righteous.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Lo! my Protecting Friend is Allah Who revealeth the Scripture. He befriendeth the righteous.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: My protector is God who sent down the Book, for it is He who protects the righteous.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Verily my protector is Allah who hath revealed the Book, and He protecteth the righteous.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: My guardian is indeed Allah who sent down the Book, and He takes care of the righteous.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: For my Protector is Allah, Who revealed the Book (from time to time), and He will choose and befriend the righteous.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Verily, my Wali (Protector, Supporter, and Helper, etc.) is Allah Who has revealed the Book (the Quran), and He protects (supports and helps) the righteous.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: My Guardian is Allah, who has sent down the Book. He guards the righteous.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: “My Master is God, He Who sent down the Book, and He takes care of the righteous.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Indeed, my protector is Allah, who has sent down the Book; and He is an ally to the righteous.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [7:196] Truly my Protector, the One in charge of my affairs, is God Who reveals the Book, the Qur’ān, and He takes charge of the righteous, by protecting them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Lo! my Protecting Friend is Allah) my Protector and Helper is Allah (who revealeth the Scripture) Who sent Gabriel to me with the Scripture. (He befriendeth the righteous) He protects the righteous.
